data.title: ZOGY: Python implementation of proper image subtraction
data.name: ZOGY
data.description: a Python implementation of proper image subtraction (Zackay, Ofek & Gal-Yam 2016, ApJ, 830, 27)

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "(2) download the latest BlackBOX/ZOGY singularity container from https://surfdrive.surf.nl/files/index.php/s/3zxuCHbt8eIh5tk"

"a Python implementation of proper image subtraction (Zackay, Ofek & Gal-Yam 2016, ApJ, 830, 27), with vital input from Barak Zackay and Eran Ofek; adapted by Kerry Paterson for integration into pipeline for MeerLICHT."

"This module accepts a new and a reference fits image ... and performs optimal image subtraction ... to produce the subtracted image (D), the significance image (S), the corrected significance image (Scorr), and PSF photometry image (Fpsf ...)."
